title: Large-Scale Multimedia Learning Preference Analysis-Based Instructional Design for Continuing Engineering Education (CEE)

context.additional_context: Course for strengthening engineering continuing education (CEE) design competencies in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Explain three or more effective multimedia integration strategies when designing continuing engineering education (CEE)
Utilize two or more tools to analyze target engineers' learning preferences (linguistic-visual cognitive styles, learning strategies, multimedia preferences)
Learners can design customized CEE (Competency-Based Education) curricula at least once, considering the independence of prior knowledge and learning preferences.

resources: Engineering CEE Case Database (Civil and Environmental Engineering)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
